ESG per Manager.objectives:
Understand the principles of ESG (Environmental, Social, Governance
Improve governance and transparency within the organization
Promote social and environmental responsibility among employees and stakeholders

instructions.title: Focus dell"Assessment
instructions.content: Evaluate the understanding of ESG principles and how they can be applied in a corporate context within the energy sector. This includes the environmental, social, and governance impact on daily operations.

instructions.title: Competenze Chiave da Valutare
instructions.content: Examine the managerial skills needed to integrate sustainable practices within the company. Identify the ability to manage ESG risks, develop sustainability policies, and promote transparency in operations.

instructions.title: Integrazione delle Strategie ESG
instructions.content: Analyze the ability of managers to implement ESG strategies aligned with business objectives. Evaluate the effectiveness in reducing carbon emissions, increasing social responsibility, and improving corporate governance.

instructions.title: Monitoraggio e Reporting ESG
instructions.content: Explore the ability of managers to monitor and report the progress of ESG initiatives, ensuring transparency and compliance with global standards. Evaluate the use of specific Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) for sustainability.

instructions.title: Leadership nella Sostenibilità
instructions.content: Evaluate the leadership abilities of managers in promoting a sustainability-oriented corporate culture. This includes the ability to motivate employees and engage stakeholders in ESG initiatives.

Leadership e Soft Skills.objectives:
Develop effective leadership skills
Improve the quality of communication within the team
Understand conflict resolution and management
Be a motivator to drive success

instructions.title: Visione e Strategia
instructions.content: Valutare la capacità del candidato di sviluppare una visione chiara e una strategia per guidare il team verso il successo.

instructions.title: Comunicazione Efficace
instructions.content: Esaminare come il candidato comunica con il team, con focus sull"ascolto attivo, la trasparenza e l"abilità di fornire feedback costruttivi.

instructions.title: Gestione dei Conflitti
instructions.content: Valutare come il candidato gestisce i conflitti all"interno del team, risolvendo le tensioni in modo costruttivo e promuovendo un ambiente di lavoro positivo.

instructions.title: Motivazione e Coinvolgimento
instructions.content: Valutare le capacità del candidato di motivare i membri del team, riconoscere i successi e coinvolgere tutti nel raggiungimento degli obiettivi comuni.

instructions.title: Delegazione e Sviluppo del Team
instructions.content: Esaminare come il candidato assegna responsabilità e supporta la crescita individuale dei membri del team, favorendo un ambiente di sviluppo continuo.
